markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reading Glyphs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2215)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 121 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These tattoos on your knuckles look like strange glyphs in an unknown language. If you press your fingertips to text in any language, these glyphs cycle in appearance through those of various extant languages. Encrypted text causes your glyphs to turn to a recognizable “null” symbol.

<document level="2" id="action-1709" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Reading Glyphs

text: <title level="1" right="Item 4" pfs="Standard" > Reading Glyphs Source Treasure Vault pg. 121 1.1 Price 90 gp Usage tattooed on the body --- These tattoos on your knuckles look like strange glyphs in an unknown language. If you press your fingertips to text in any language, these glyphs cycle in appearance through those of various extant languages. Encrypted text causes your glyphs to turn to a recognizable “null” symbol.
